element.name: clockoverlay
element.description: Overlays the current clock time on a video stream
element.author: Tim-Philipp Müller <tim@centricular.net>

element.name: textoverlay
element.description: Adds text strings on top of a video buffer
element.author: David Schleef <ds@schleef.org>, Zeeshan Ali <zeeshan.ali@nokia.com>

element.name: textrender
element.description: Renders a text string to an image bitmap
element.author: David Schleef <ds@schleef.org>, GStreamer maintainers <gstreamer-devel@lists.sourceforge.net>

element.name: timeoverlay
element.description: Overlays buffer time stamps on a video stream
element.author: Tim-Philipp Müller <tim@centricular.net>
